CrbnCreditAlloc.name: CrbnCreditAlloc
CrbnCreditAlloc.description: Represents information about how the carbon credits are allocated by an organization to offset their emissions.

AllocatedCarbonCrCost.description: The amount spent on carbon credits to offset the emissions.

AnnualEmssnInventoryId.description: The annual emissions inventory associated with the carbon credit allocation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the carbon credit allocation.

NetEmissionsInTco2e.description: The remaining emissions that couldn't be offset for the annual emissions inventory.

NetScope1EmssnInTco2e.description: The remaining scope 1 emissions that couldn't be offset for the annual emissions inventory.

NetScope2EmssnInTco2e.description: The remaining scope 2 emissions that couldn't be offset for the annual emissions inventory.

NetScope3EmssnInTco2e.description: Total remaining scope 3 emissions that couldn't be offset.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Scp1CrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The carbon credits allocated to the scope 1 emissions inventory.

Scp2CrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The carbon credits allocated to the scope 2 emissions inventory.

Scp3CrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The carbon credits allocated to the scope 3 emissions inventory.

TotalCrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The carbon credits allocated for the annual emissions inventory.

TotalEmssnInTco2e.description: The total emissions derived from the annual emissions inventory that an organization can offset.

TotalScope1EmssnInTco2e.description: The scope 1 emissions that can be offset.

TotalScope2EmssnInTco2e.description: The scope 2 emissions that can be offset.

TotalScope3EmssnInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions that can be offset.

Year.description: The year when the carbon credit was allocated.
